projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

fields.description: Jelly Bean introduced [new notification features|http://developer.android.com/about/versions/jelly-bean.html] (search for "notifications") that are best and most easily "built up" via [NotificationBuilder|http://developer.android.com/reference/android/app/Notification.Builder.html]. We are considering making a wrapper of that in Ti Android.
fields.summary: Android: Support Android NotificationBuilder including Jelly Bean extensions
